title: STUCK IN RICONNECT PAGE
body:
Good evening everyone, me and my friend were doing a normal game when we suddenly disconnected from the server . Now it's  two hours that  we try in vain to reconnect to the game , some rioter could please enter the game and finish it? we just want to start other games , we're stuck here , if no one intervenes we could no longer play lol .
I used google translator , excuse the bad English

replies.body:
> excuse the bad English
